modules.name: The Mustard Seed

parable.title: The Parable of the Mustard Seed
parable.content: He told them another parable: 'The kingdom of heaven is like a mustard seed, which a man took and planted in his field. Though it is the smallest of all seeds, yet when it grows, it is the largest of garden plants and becomes a tree, so that the birds come and perch in its branches.'
parable.reflection: How does God use small beginnings to create great things in your life?

modules.unlock_message: Module complete! Take time to reflect on the parable.

modules.name: The Sower

parable.title: The Parable of the Sower
parable.content: A sower scatters seed, but it lands on different kinds of soil. Only good soil produces lasting growth.
parable.reflection: What kind of soil is your heart today — and what would help it receive the word more deeply?

modules.unlock_message: Parable unlocked! Consider what helps you grow.

modules.name: Wheat and Weeds

parable.title: The Parable of the Wheat and the Weeds
parable.content: Wheat and weeds grow together for a season. Patience and wisdom are needed until the right time.
parable.reflection: Where do you need patience — trusting God to bring clarity and fruit in time?

modules.unlock_message: Parable unlocked! Practice patience and discernment.

modules.name: The Lost Sheep

parable.title: The Parable of the Lost Sheep
parable.content: A shepherd leaves the ninety-nine to search for the one that is lost — then rejoices when it is found.
parable.reflection: How does being sought and found change the way you see yourself and others?

modules.unlock_message: Parable unlocked! You are seen and pursued.

parable.title: The Parable of the Prodigal Son
parable.content: A son returns home after wandering. The father runs to meet him with mercy — and invites everyone into restoration.
parable.reflection: Where might God be inviting you into return, forgiveness, or celebration?

parable.title: The Parable of the Hidden Treasure
parable.content: A person discovers a hidden treasure and joyfully gives everything to gain it.
parable.reflection: What would it look like to value God's kingdom above comfort or convenience?

modules.name: The Pearl of Great Price

parable.title: The Parable of the Pearl of Great Price
parable.content: A merchant finds a pearl of great value and gives everything to obtain it.
parable.reflection: What helps you recognize what is truly valuable — and respond with wholeheartedness?

modules.unlock_message: Parable unlocked! Hold fast to what matters most.
